title: Yasuo block with his wall lulus W

embed.description: Yasuo can block a point and click skill?!

body: how can yasuo block a point and click spell? Its not a skillshot! You can see it on the movie on youtube i have linked.

replies.body: You guys can't whine about Yasuo if you misunderstand projectile with skillshot.
It's still a projectile just like old {{champion:44}} point and click stun gem. and besides, it's not a laser but moves fast like 1.
it's a projectile so it can be blocked.
Skillshots are projectiles but not all projectiles are skillshots. Yasuo can block all projectiles. Lulu W is a very fast projectile.
